page.title: 09Shopping and parks in Camden
page.content: Camden Town is exellent for shopping for clothes, shoes and food. As well as being buisy with shops there are parks. They are great and fun. They have playgrounds and if it rains you could always go to the zoo. To keep you amused at bonfire night you can see firerworks and get food. Primrose Hill is the main in Camden so is Regents Park, in Regents Park there is an open air theater. Parks are fun, especially these two. All together Camden Town is a very exiting place to visit.
